appName: Mystery Box VR: Hidden Secrets Escape

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: Mystery Box VR: Hidden Secrets Escape
display_name: Mystery Box VR: Hidden Secrets Escape
display_long_description:
# AN IMMERSIVE VR PUZZLE EXPERIENCE
Interact with objects, handles, buttons, and wheels on each side. Crack enigmas and collect hidden puzzle tiles on a random side of the boxes.

You won't be able to compare reality with fiction.

# DISCOVER INVENTIONS
Once you unlock all 8 boxes of a Level Pack, you can compose a puzzle and discover a brief history of an invention.

It's not always easy to escape the room, so use all your IQ to crack the riddles. There's a logic behind all of them, even where it seems it's not!

# IMMERSIVE SOUNDTRACK
Play the game with your headphones to get immersed in this amazing adventure.

# HINTS
Got stuck on some enigma? No worries, you can still get a helpful hint! You can also get in touch with me in case you really can't make it through a riddle, I'll be glad to help ;)

# MULTILANGUAGE
Available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, and Japanese.

The game language will change automatically based on the language settings of your device
